name: Room One
description:
Set in a greenhouse,

On a faraway planet.

Grow food to feed your colony!

WASD/Arrow keys to move, SPACE to activate objects.

Use the computer to see how many seeds you have.

When the rings start glowing, activate them to collect rewards.

(You'll get some seeds at the start of day one, collect them from the machine)

(Activate planters to plant seeds, when the plants start to glow, they're ready to harvest - activate them again - this gives you some more seeds and some food for your colony)
